column2: Capitol Rioter deceased due to motorcycle collision
column5: www.rawstory.com/â€¦ Interesting. Sudden death. Involuntary death. Was he nervous? On Tuesday NBC4 Washington investigative reporter Scott MacFarlane reported that Joseph Barnes a Texas man accused of participating in the attack on the U.S. Capitol on January 6 died last month in a motorcycle crash in Austin while awaiting trial.
